findings.title: Outdated borsh library version in Cargo.toml
findings.description: The `Cargo.toml` file in the project contains an outdated version of the `borsh` library. The current version is 0.10.3, while the recommended version is 1.3.0.

findings.title: Compilation Issues Due to Conflicting near-sdk Versions in Cargo.toml
findings.description: The project encounters compilation issues due to conflicting versions of the `near-sdk` crate specified in the `Cargo.toml` file.

findings.title: F-2023-0295 - Inconsistent Claim Availability Logic
findings.description: The current implementation of the claim availability logic allows users to claim instantly if they haven't claimed before, regardless of the specified claim period.

findings.title: Tests Can Be Excluded From Coverage Report
findings.description: The current definition of the `make cov` command includes test files (`tests.rs`) in the coverage report, skewing the final result.
